Title: Thailand’s PTT seeks an additional April LNG cargo
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT has issued a tender to purchase an LNG cargo for delivery to its Map Ta Phut terminal in Rayong on Apr. 25-26. The tender closes on Mar. 13.
Author: CK

Title: NextDecade and Baker Hughes enter framework agreement for Rio Grande LNG expansion
Description: US project developer NextDecade has signed a framework agreement with Baker Hughes for the  supply of advanced gas turbine and refrigerant compressor technology, as well as long-term maintenance services, for Trains 4 through 8 at its Rio Grande LNG facility in Brownsville, Texas.
Author: CK
